frontmatter.author: Suzanne Eder
frontmatter.title: [T]here's a crucial difference between learning from someone, and giving our power away to another person's formul√¶.  One comes from self-worth, the other comes from the sense of lack.

frontmatter.author: Paulo Coelho
frontmatter.title: When you possess great treasures within you, and try to tell others of them, seldom are you believed.
